title: Phenotypical and biochemical characterization of murine psoriasiform and fibrotic skin disease models in Stabilin‐deficient mice
details: J Krzistetzko, C Géraud, C Dormann, A Riedel… - FEBS Open Bio
abstract: Stabilin‐1 (Stab1) and Stabilin‐2 (Stab2) are scavenger receptors expressed by liver sinusoidal endothelial cells (LSECs). The Stabilin‐mediated scavenging function is responsible for regulating the molecular composition of circulating blood in …
